home.heroLead: Integrates fixed stations (ultrasound + infrasound + AI), a thermal-camera drone, and the BearAware mobile app (map + chatbot) to detect, deter and educate — without harming animals.
home.why1: Real-time AI detection on fixed stations and drone
home.why2: Non-lethal deterrence: alternating ultrasound/infrasound and menthol mist
home.why3: Public alerts: RoAlert + app with map and notifications
home.why4: Educational dimension: chatbot with best practices
home.roadmap1Desc: Working AI model (YOLOv8); fixed station prototype with camera and speaker.
home.roadmap2Desc: Live map and educational chatbot; detection sync.
home.roadmap3Desc: Supervised tests with sanctuaries and mountain rescue; parameter tuning.
home.ctaLead: Join the beta and get notified at launch.

footer.tagline: Protecting wildlife and communities through innovative AI technology

app.f1: Interactive map with red zones on detections

problems.title: The Problem
problems.lead: Bears increasingly reach settlements, attracted by waste and feeding; conflicts grow while responses are reactive, not preventive.
problems.c2: Dependence on waste and tourist feeding
problems.r1: How do we protect people without harming bears?
problems.r2: How do we restore bears’ dignity and natural habits?
problems.r3: How do we make mountain trails safe again?
problems.seeStudies: See the Studies page for our documents and references.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.lead: Three components: fixed stations (ultrasound + infrasound + AI), a thermal-camera drone, and the BearAware mobile app (map + chatbot).
solution.fixed3: Alerts to app and RoAlert, map markers
solution.resourcesLead: See Studies for bibliography, acoustic modeling and prototype recommendations.
